item.title: Drain constantly lifting opposite The Hollies, Gretton, 27th January
item.description:
Drain on pavement opposite The Hollies, next to railway bridge on grass verge by the footpath. Drain is constantly being lifted by heavy rain exposing the drain. Currently a big hole but will lift as soon as heavy rain again. This has been happening for a long while now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Double yellows faded and cars blocking driveways, 27th January
item.description:
There are no road markings on Gloucester Road & the double yellows and parking bays outside the all houses are faded. People are unable to see them (and clearly don’t care) that they are blocking access to the driveways! Please can the lines be re-done so that it is clear that they are not in parking bays and are blocking driveways. Permit parking but I never see anyone parking attendants on this road. Another case of glos road being completely overlooked and no care for the residents of this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 111, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car collision causing damage., 27th January
item.description:
On the gate of our property number 53a, on December the 7th two car crashed into the lamppost sign on the round about. This then fell and damaged our gate and fence. Highways came out that day and cut down the lamppost as has been pulled out of the concrete and was falling into our property. This has been reported, however no one has come to carry out the works as and can’t see anything active on fix my street. We have now repaired the damage to our property however the lamppost has electrical live wires with a danger bag over it. We live right by an infants school and this needs to be made priority to be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadow Way, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
